> <OLD>
>
> The mention of Rodimus makes Tucson growl under his breath.  He felt a
> powerful urge to dismember him from top to bottom for what he assumed was a
> major betrayal on his part.  A part of his temper escapes him as he punches
> the wall with his fist.

At the sound of the impact from TUSCON's fist hitting the wall BIG
CONVOY as well as MACH KICK and BREAK turned to look him, weapons
drawn and ready.

"What was that?" LONG RACK asked over the com link.

BIG CONVOY frowned, "Our Prime letting off some steam." he said
shortly over the link.

"Well what ever it was, it has alerted Magamtron's men to your
location." There was a pause and then he continued, "I will do what I
can to divert them, but they are coming in your direction now."

Even as LONG RACK spoke, in the distance the sound of many feet could
be heard moving in their direction.

"Slag." CONVOY said in a fierce whisper, "We have to move, now."

(TAG)

Preston
